concept.title: Device Framework Overview
concept.shortdesc: This document introduces you to the Device Framework collection.

section.title: Purpose
section.p: Device Framework provides a framework and plug-ins for hardware accelerated access to media services.

section.title: Architectural Relationship
section.p: The Device Framework is the layer below the controller plug-ins and above the hardware.
